tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE policy_holders (
    holder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    holder_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    holder_address TEXT,
    policy_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES policy_coverage_details(policy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE coverage_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id INT,
    date_effective DATE,
    date_expiry DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES policy_coverage_details(policy_id)
);
